body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as T0_systolic,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0006]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value as T0_diastolic
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.blood_pressure.v2]
  )
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  1
